SELECT r.review_code, r.review_title AS reviewTitle, r.review_body AS reviewBody, r.review_score AS reviewScore, res.restaurant_name AS restaurantName, u.user_name AS userName,
( SELECT rp.review_picture_url FROM review_picture rp WHERE rp.review_code = r.review_code ORDER BY rp.review_picture_code LIMIT 1 ) AS picture
FROM review r JOIN restaurant res ON r.restaurant_code = res.restaurant_code JOIN member u ON r.user_code = u.user_code
WHERE r.restaurant_code = #{restaurantCode}
ORDER BY r.created_at DESC
